verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to her that is rebellious<WH4754> and polluted<WH1351>! to the oppressing<WH3238> city<WH5892>!
She obeyed<WH8085> not the voice<WH6963>; she received<WH3947> not correction<WH4148>; she trusted<WH982> not in Jehovah<WH3068>; she drew not near<WH7126> to her God<WH430>.
Her princes<WH8269> in the midst<WH7130> of her are roaring<WH7580> lions<WH738>; her judges<WH8199> are evening<WH6153> wolves<WH2061>; they leave nothing<WH1633> till the morrow<WH1242>.
Her prophets<WH5030> are light<WH6348> and treacherous<WH900> persons<WH582>; her priests<WH3548> have profaned<WH2490> the sanctuary<WH6944>, they have done violence<WH2554> to the law<WH8451>.

Jehovah <WH3068> in the midst<WH7130> of her is righteous<WH6662>; he will not do<WH6213> iniquity<WH5766>; every<WH1242> morning<WH1242> doth he bring<WH5414> his justice<WH4941> to light<WH216>, he faileth<WH5737> not<WH5767>; but the unjust knoweth<WH3045> no shame<WH1322>.

I have cut off<WH3772> nations<WH1471>; their battlements<WH6438> are desolate<WH8074>; I have made their streets<WH2351> waste<WH2717>, so that none passeth by<WH5674>; their cities<WH5892> are destroyed<WH6658>, so that there is no man<WH376>, so that there is no inhabitant<WH3427>.

I said<WH559>, Only fear<WH3372> thou me<WH3947>; receive correction<WH4148>; so her dwelling<WH4583> shall not be cut off<WH3772>, according<WH834> to all that I have appointed<WH6485> concerning her<WH403>: but they rose early<WH7925> and corrupted<WH7843> all their doings<WH5949>.

Therefore wait<WH2442> ye for me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>, until the day<WH3117> that I rise up<WH6965> to the prey<WH5706>; for my determination<WH4941> is to gather<WH622> the nations<WH1471>, that I may assemble<WH6908> the kingdoms<WH4467>, to pour<WH8210> upon them mine indignation<WH2195>, even all my fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639>; for all the earth<WH776> shall be devoured<WH398> with the fire<WH784> of my jealousy<WH7068>.

For then will I turn<WH2015> to the peoples<WH5971> of a pure<WH1305> language<WH8193>, that they may all call<WH7121> upon the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068>, to serve<WH5647> him with one<WH259> consent<WH7926>.
From beyond<WH5676> the rivers<WH5104> of Ethiopia<WH3568> my suppliants<WH6282>, even the daughter<WH1323> of my dispersed<WH6327>, shall bring<WH2986> mine offering<WH4503>.

In that day<WH3117> shalt thou not be put to shame<WH954> for all thy doings<WH5949>, wherein thou hast transgressed<WH6586> against me<WH5493>; for then I will take away out of the midst<WH7130> of thee thy proudly<WH1346> exulting<WH5947> ones<WH3254>, and thou shalt no more be haughty<WH1361> in my holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>.
But I will leave<WH7604> in the midst<WH7130> of thee an afflicted<WH6041> and poor<WH1800> people<WH5971>, and they shall take refuge<WH2620> in the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

The remnant<WH7611> of Israel<WH3478> shall not do<WH6213> iniquity<WH5766>, nor speak<WH1696> lies<WH3577>; neither shall a deceitful<WH8649> tongue<WH3956> be found<WH4672> in their mouth<WH6310>; for they shall feed<WH7462> and lie down<WH7257>, and none shall make them afraid<WH2729>.
Sing <WH7442>, O daughter<WH1323> of Zion<WH6726>; shout<WH7321>, O Israel<WH3478>; be glad<WH8055> and rejoice<WH5937> with all the heart<WH3820>, O daughter<WH1323> of Jerusalem<WH3389>.

Jehovah <WH3068> hath taken away<WH5493> thy judgments<WH4941>, he hath cast out<WH6437> thine enemy<WH341>: the King<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478>, even Jehovah<WH3068>, is in the midst<WH7130> of thee<WH7200>; thou shalt not fear evil any more<WH7451>.
In that day<WH3117> it shall be said<WH559> to Jerusalem<WH3389>, Fear<WH3372> thou not<WH6726>; O Zion, let not thy hands<WH3027> be slack<WH7503>.

Jehovah <WH3068> thy God<WH430> is in the midst<WH7130> of thee<WH1368>, a mighty one who will save<WH3467>; he will rejoice<WH7797> over thee with joy<WH8057>; he will rest<WH2790> in his love<WH160>; he will joy<WH1523> over thee with singing<WH7440>.
I will gather<WH622> them that sorrow<WH3013> for the solemn assembly<WH4150>, who were of thee<WH4864>; to whom the burden upon her was a reproach<WH2781>.

Behold <WH6256>, at that time I will deal<WH6213> with all them that afflict<WH6031> thee<WH3467>; and I will save that which is lame<WH6760>, and gather<WH6908> that which was driven away<WH5080>; and I will make<WH7760> them a praise<WH8416> and a name<WH8034>, whose shame<WH1322> hath been in all the earth<WH776>.

At that time<WH6256> will I bring<WH935> you in<WH6256>, and at that time will I gather<WH6908> you<WH5414>; for I will make you a name<WH8034> and a praise<WH8416> among all the peoples<WH5971> of the earth<WH776>, when I bring back<WH7725> your captivity<WH7622> before your eyes<WH5869>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>.
